backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining comprehensive healthcare platform types (hospitals, professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances, medical records, research projects, health records, medical tourism) with role-based access control, blob storage mixins, and CRUD operations for stakeholder management, registration requests, and document handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of KnowledgeBoard page component with hospital license types, regulatory compliance requirements, route configuration updates, and navigation link changes, mapping features to test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, pages (Dashboard, Contact, KnowledgeBoard, Careers, Vendors, etc.), components (Chatbot, Navigation, RequestDetailCard), hooks (useQueries), and styling with Royal Teal color scheme and form styling rules.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components using numeric color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, favicon reference, and root div mounting point for the SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router setup using TanStack Router with 18 routes (Home, AboutUs, Solutions, KnowledgeBoard, AdminDashboard, Members, etc.), QueryClient configuration, InternetIdentityProvider wrapper, and Layout component integration.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: Floating AI chatbot component with expandable interface, message history, contextual responses about healthcare services (RCM, technology, network, careers, vendors, ambulances, NGOs), and contact information (info@aihealthzon.com, +91-8696766966) using Royal Teal styling.
A React form component using react-hook-form for submitting demo booking requests with fields for name, hospital, designation, mobile, email, city, and message. Includes validation, toast notifications, and calls useSaveDemoBookingRequest mutation hook on submission.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying AI Health Zon branding, contact email, social media links (Facebook, X, LinkedIn, Instagram), navigation links organized in columns, and legal links (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service). Includes copyright notice and responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps the application with Navigation header, main content area (Outlet), Footer, and WhatsAppButton. Provides consistent structure across all pages.
frontend/src/components/MemberDetailView: Dialog component displaying detailed member profiles for healthcare professionals, vendors, or NGOs. Shows profile information, contact details, specialties/services, and action buttons for WhatsApp and email communication.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Main navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menu, and authentication button. Includes links to all major pages and handles Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/PendingRequestsL: List component that displays pending requests (professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO) using RequestDetailCard components. Shows loading state and empty state when no requests exist.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form for new users to select account type (hospital, professional, vendor, NGO) and enter their name. Uses useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation to save the profile.
frontend/src/components/RequestDetailCar: Displays detailed information for registration requests (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances) with expand/collapse functionality and approve/reject actions. Handles mutations for approving or rejecting requests and displays contact information, documents, and request-specific details.
frontend/src/components/StakeholderDetai: Modal dialog component that displays comprehensive details for stakeholders (hospitals, vendors, NGOs) including contact information, location, and type-specific fields. Provides actions to open WhatsApp, email, and website links.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Fixed floating button component that opens WhatsApp chat with a predefined phone number (918696766966) in a new window.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating actors with or without identity based on login state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes and initializes access control with admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient. Manages authentication state, identity persistence, and provides status indicators for the login process.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, admin checks, registration submissions, pending request queries, and approval/rejection mutations. Each hook uses the actor from useActor and manages query invalidation appropriately.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles using Tailwind CSS with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes in OKLCH color space. Defines enterprise color scheme (Royal Teal and Royal White) with special styling for form inputs, buttons, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About Us page displaying company mission, vision, values, and team information with hero section, CTA buttons, and a demo booking modal. Uses enterprise branding colors and includes image assets for visual content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard for reviewing and managing pending stakeholder registration requests (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances). Includes access control check and displays summary cards with counts for each stakeholder type.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Ambulance service registration page with form for submitting service details, automatic PIN code lookup for city/state, and service type selection (emergency, ICU, event). Submits registration requests pending admin approval.
frontend/src/pages/Blog.tsx: Empty blog page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogArticle.tsx: Empty blog article page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Healthcare professional registration page with form for job applications including CV upload, role selection, experience, and location details with automatic PIN code lookup. Submits registration requests pending admin approval.
frontend/src/pages/CaseStudies.tsx: Case studies page with hero section and empty state indicating success stories are coming soon. Includes multiple CTAs for demo booking throughout the page.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying phone, email, and location information with multiple CTAs for scheduling calls and booking demos. Includes chatbot component and demo booking modal.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Empty dashboard page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentHome.tsx: Empty document home page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Documents.tsx: Empty documents page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentViewer.tsx: Empty document viewer page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Displays a grid of healthcare support categories (workforce, emergency, diagnostics, pharmacy, home healthcare, mental health, vendors, NGOs, insurance, compliance, education, logistics) with icons, images, descriptions, and navigation to specific pages or toast notifications on click.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with a hero carousel showcasing RCM and healthcare solutions, metrics, why-choose-us cards, solution cards with navigation, and a demo booking modal.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBoard.tsx: Provides comprehensive information on hospital licensing and regulatory compliance in India, featuring a hero section, introduction, accordion-based content, and a demo booking modal with external research publication link.
frontend/src/pages/Members.tsx: Displays a grid of approved network members (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs) fetched via API, with member type badges and a detail view modal for selected members.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Searchable directory of hospitals, vendors, and NGOs with filters for category and location, displaying entities in a grid with type icons and a detail view modal for selected stakeholders.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkMap.tsx: Displays a visual network map of approved healthcare stakeholders across India, showing statistics (total stakeholders, cities covered) and a filterable grid of locations grouped by city with stakeholder counts.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: Provides NGO registration form with PIN code auto-lookup for location and displays a filterable list of all registered NGOs by location and focus area, with admin approval workflow.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Interactive onboarding guide showing the 10-phase healthcare revenue cycle management process (patient registration through reporting & analytics) with navigation between phases and key points for each.
frontend/src/pages/PatientJourney.tsx: Placeholder page for upcoming Patient Journey Document Library feature that will manage patient documentation across the 10-phase healthcare journey.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining information collection, usage, sharing, security measures, and user rights with contact information.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Static refund policy page detailing eligibility criteria, request process, processing times, non-refundable items, and cancellation terms.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: Solutions page showcasing Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) features with hero banner, problem statements, impact metrics, feature cards, FAQ accordion, and demo booking modal integration.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Terms & Conditions page displaying legal terms of service including acceptance, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and contact information in a card layout.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: Vendor registration page with form for vendor details (name, category, products, contact, location), PIN code auto-fill functionality, and display of existing approved vendors with filtering capabilities.
frontend/src/utils/pinCodeLookup.ts: Utility function to lookup Indian city and state information from 6-digit PIN codes using the India Post API (postalpincode.in).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utilities for extracting, storing, and managing query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including enterprise color palette, container settings, custom animations, and plugin integrations for typography and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking AI Health Zon platform architecture, features, known issues (chatbot, gradient text, mobile layout), and RCM-first positioning strategy targeting hospital decision-makers.
